p: Microwave-assisted extraction were performed using 30 g of dried fruits of P. emargnatus in 13.2 mL of water. To optimize the influence of experimental variables: the extraction time, moisture and microwave irradiation in the extraction yield we performed a 2 3 experimental design. Table 1 shows the coded (in parentheses) and the decoded values of the independent variables, namely, time (min), moisture (water added to sample) (%) and microwave power (W), on the experimental extraction yields (% v/ w) and volume (mL) of volatile oil obtained.
